kizuna_rival_d_02:
I had a feeling you’d turn up if I hung out here
for a while...[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_03: And lo and behold, I was right![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_04:
Well, now that I’ve found you, we should swing
by my room and have a chat![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_05: Ta-ta-tachán! Welcome to the Zona Nemona![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_06:
Aw, thank— Wait a sec... I know we’ve been to
YOUR room before...[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_07: But have I never had you over here? Wild![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_08:
[BD06:0]Anyway, uh... Listen, [trnm:0].
You\r
know\r
how\r
I, well...[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_09:
You know how I really like Pokémon battles?
Like, really, REALLY like ’em?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_10:
Cool. And yeah, you know how when you really
like something, you dive in deep?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_11:
That’s what I did with Pokémon battles, and I...
just kinda became a Champion?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_12:
But then I found out that’s pretty special—that
normally, it’s not so simple for most people.[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_13:
People would tell me to my face that I’d only
managed it ’cause I have some innate gift, or\r
’cause I was raised differently, or whatever.[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_14:
And suddenly I started to feel like there was this
invisible wall between me and everyone else.[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_15:
So I started going easy when I’d battle my
friends. I just wanted everyone to have fun.[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_16:
Oh, but don’t worry, I’m not doing that anymore!
I’m going 100-percent all out![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_17:
Especially since I’m lucky enough to have an
opponent around who can beat me even when\r
I’m in full hard-core mode![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_18:
[BD06:0]So just promise me one thing,
OK, [trnm:0]?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_19:
Promise you’ll always stay my equal! You and me,
true rivals![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_20:
[BD06:0]Heh heh. You’re the best,
[trnm:0].\r
Thank you![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_21:
Oof, that got pretty personal! Little bit
embarrassed over here...[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_22:
Anyway! Since we’re equals, I gotta start having
you over as much as we hang out in your room![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_23:
Feel free to burst on into the Zona Nemona
whenever you want![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_d_24:
And get ready for the Academy Ace Tournament,
’cause I’m gonna stomp ya this time![npcn:4]
